title: Module 1: The Robotic Nervous System (ROS 2)
description: Welcome to Module 1, "The Robotic Nervous System (ROS 2)"! This module is designed to introduce you to the fundamental concepts of the Robot Operating System 2 (ROS 2), a flexible framework for writing robot software. Whether you're a student, a developer new to robotics, or an enthusiast interested in Physical AI and humanoid robotics, this module will provide you with the foundational knowledge and practical skills to get started.
